name: Run mode
description: Specify if you want to run as local

parameters.name: batch_size
parameters.label: Quantity
parameters.helpText: Batch size of the HTTP requests (quantity param in the API url)

parameters.name: requested_data
parameters.label: Total amount of data
parameters.helpText: Total amount of data (it will be divided by Quantity, e.g. requested_data 5000 and quantity 1000 means 5 HTTP requests)
